verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> he to <S%G1191>Derbe<s%> and <S%G3082>Lystra:<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> was <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> which was a <S%G2453>Jewess,<s%> and <S%G4103>believed;<s%> but his <S%G3962>father<s%> was a <S%G1672>Greek:<s%>
<S%G3739>Which<s%> was <S%G3140>well<s%> <S%G3140>reported<s%> of by the <S%G80>brothers<s%> that were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> and <S%G2430>Iconium.<s%>

Him <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> have to <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> with him; and <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5117>quarters:<s%> for they <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that his <S%G3962>father<s%> was a <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

And as they <S%G1279>went<s%> <S%G1279>through<s%> the <S%G4172>cities,<s%> they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> for to <S%G5442>keep,<s%> that were <S%G2919>ordained<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%G3767>so<s%> were the <S%G1577>churches<s%> <S%G4732>established<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G4052>increased<s%> in <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G2596>daily.<s%> <S%G2250><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when they had <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1330>throughout<s%> <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%> and the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia,<s%> and were <S%G2967>forbidden<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> to <S%G2980>preach<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in <S%G773>Asia,<s%>

After they were <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3465>Mysia,<s%> they <S%G3985>assayed<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2596>into<s%> <S%G978>Bithynia:<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> them not.
And they <S%G3928>passing<s%> by <S%G3465>Mysia<s%> <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

And a <S%G3705>vision<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> in the <S%G3571>night;<s%> There <S%G2476>stood<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> and <S%G3870>prayed<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1224>Come<s%> <S%G1224>over<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and <S%G997>help<s%> us.

And <S%G5613>after<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G3705>vision,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> we <S%G2212>endeavored<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G4822>assuredly<s%> <S%G4822>gathering<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G4341>called<s%> us for to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to them.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G321>loosing<s%> from <S%G5174>Troas,<s%> we <S%G2113>came<s%> with a <S%G2113>straight<s%> <S%G2113>course<s%> to <S%G4543>Samothracia,<s%> and the <S%G1966>next<s%> day to <S%G3496>Neapolis;<s%>

And from <S%G1564>there<s%> to <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> of that <S%G3310>part<s%> of <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and a <S%G2862>colony:<s%> and we were in that <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1304>abiding<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> we <S%G1831>went<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city<s%> by a <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G3844>side,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> was <S%G3543>wont<s%> to be <S%G1511>made;<s%> and we <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G1135>women<s%> which <S%G4905>resorted<s%> thither.

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3070>Lydia,<s%> a <S%G4211>seller<s%> of <S%G4211>purple,<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> which <S%G4576>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> us: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1272>opened,<s%> that she <S%G4337>attended<s%> to the things which were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> she was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> and her <S%G3624>household,<s%> she <S%G3870>sought<s%> us, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you have <S%G2919>judged<s%> me to be <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G3306>abide<s%> there. And she <S%G3849>constrained<s%> us.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as we <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3814>damsel<s%> <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4436>divination<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> us, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> her <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> by <S%G3132>soothsaying:<s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2628>followed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and us, and <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> are the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of the <S%G5310>most<s%> <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2605>show<s%> to us the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> she <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> But <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> being <S%G1278>grieved,<s%> <S%G1994>turned<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> I <S%G3853>command<s%> you in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G1831>come<s%> out of her. And he <S%G1831>came<s%> out the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And when her <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of their <S%G2039>gains<s%> was <S%G1831>gone,<s%> they <S%G1949>caught<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas,<s%> and <S%G1670>drew<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G58>marketplace<s%> to the <S%G758>rulers,<s%>

And <S%G4317>brought<s%> them to the <S%G4755>magistrates,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> do <S%G1613>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1613>trouble<s%> our <S%G4172>city,<s%>

And <S%G2605>teach<s%> <S%G1485>customs,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for us to <S%G3858>receive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> to <S%G4160>observe,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4514>Romans.<s%>

And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4911>rose<s%> up <S%G4911>together<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> them: and the <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> <S%G4048>rent<s%> <S%G4048>off<s%> their <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> to <S%G4463>beat<s%> them.

And when they had <S%G2007>laid<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4127>stripes<s%> on them, they <S%G906>cast<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G3853>charging<s%> the <S%G1200>jailor<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> them <S%G806>safely:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G3852>charge,<s%> <S%G906>thrust<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2082>inner<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G805>made<s%> their <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G805>fast<s%> in the <S%G3586>stocks.<s%>

And <S%G2596>at<s%> <S%G3317>midnight<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> and <S%G5214>sang<s%> praises to <S%G2316>God:<s%> and the <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> <S%G1874>heard<s%> them.

And <S%G869>suddenly<s%> there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G2310>foundations<s%> of the <S%G1201>prison<s%> were <S%G4531>shaken:<s%> and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> were <S%G455>opened,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> one's <S%G1199>bands<s%> were <S%G447>loosed.<s%>

And the <S%G1200>keeper<s%> of the <S%G1200>prison<s%> <S%G1096>awaking<s%> <S%G1853><s%> out of his <S%G1853>sleep,<s%> and <S%G1492>seeing<s%> the <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G2374>doors<s%> <S%G455>open,<s%> he <S%G4685>drew<s%> out his <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and <S%G3195>would<s%> have <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> that the <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> had been <S%G1628>fled.<s%>

But <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5455>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4238>Do<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2556>harm:<s%> for we are <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1759>here.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G154>called<s%> for a <S%G5457>light,<s%> and <S%G1530>sprang<s%> in, and <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1096>trembling,<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas,<s%>
And <S%G4254>brought<s%> them out, and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Sirs,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> to be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>
And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4100>Believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and you shall be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> and your <S%G3624>house.<s%>
And they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to him the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> that were in his <S%G3614>house.<s%>

And he <S%G3880>took<s%> them the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G3068>washed<s%> their <S%G4127>stripes;<s%> and was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> he and <S%G3956>all<s%> his, <S%G3916>straightway.<s%>

And when he had <S%G321>brought<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G3624>house,<s%> he <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G5132>meat<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> them, and <S%G21>rejoiced,<s%> <S%G4100>believing<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3832>all<s%> his <S%G3832>house.<s%>
And when it was <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> the <S%G4465>sergeants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G630>Let<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G630>go.<s%>

And the <S%G1200>keeper<s%> of the <S%G1200>prison<s%> <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G5128>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> The <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> have <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G630>let<s%> you <S%G630>go:<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>depart,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> in <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

But <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to them, They have <S%G1194>beaten<s%> us <S%G1219>openly<s%> <S%G178>uncondemned,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4514>Romans,<s%> and have <S%G906>cast<s%> us <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison;<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> do they <S%G1544>thrust<s%> us out <S%G2977>privately?<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1063>truly;<s%> but let them <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> and <S%G1806>fetch<s%> us out.

And the <S%G4465>sergeants<s%> <S%G312>told<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> to the <S%G4755>magistrates:<s%> and they <S%G5399>feared,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that they were <S%G4514>Romans.<s%>
And they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G3870>sought<s%> them, and <S%G1806>brought<s%> them out, and <S%G2065>desired<s%> them to <S%G1831>depart<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city.<s%>

And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out of the <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the house of <S%G3070>Lydia:<s%> and when they had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> they <S%G3870>comforted<s%> them, and <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
